meanings.definition: The state or quality of being clammy.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside in the rain, the clamminesses of my clothes made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The clamminesses of the cave walls indicated the presence of moisture.
meanings.sent3: Feeling the clamminesses of the slime on his hands, Tim couldn't help but cringe.
meanings.sent4: The clamminesses of the fog enveloped the town, creating an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The clamminesses of the mud made it difficult for the hikers to keep their footing.

meanings.definition: A feeling of dampness or stickiness on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The clamminesses of sweat on his forehead indicated the intensity of his workout.
meanings.sent2: She wiped away the clamminesses on her palms before shaking hands with the guests.
meanings.sent3: The clamminesses of the lotion made her skin feel refreshed and hydrated.
meanings.sent4: As the humidity rose, the clamminesses in the air became more noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The clamminesses of the spilled drink left a sticky residue on the table.
